g.H518: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
g.H3808: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles

g.H1826: to be dumb; by implication, to be astonished, to stop; also to perish

g.H1580: to treat a person (well or ill), i.e. benefit or requite; by implication (of toil), to ripen, i.e. (specifically) to wean
g.H5921: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
g.H517: a mother (as the bond of the family); in a wide sense (both literally and figuratively (like father))

g.H3478: Jisrael, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity
g.H3176: to wait; by implication, to be patient, hope
g.H413: near, with or among; often in general, to
g.H3068: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
g.H6258: at this time, whether adverb, conjunction or expletive
g.H5704: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
